vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 2009 for an attached projecting non-premise district activity videoboard sign on property zoned Planned Development District No. 619, on the south side of Commerce Street, between Lane Street and South Ervay Street
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval, subject to conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to conditions.
Z245-128(CC) / Z-25-000138

*In alignment with ForwardDallas.
